Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arlan.chess.model.figures.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Piece abstract class represents information about single piece on board.

      • checkMove

        public boolean checkMove​(Board board,
                         java.util.List<Move> legalMoves,
                         Cell destination)
        Return true if move is valid, else black Firstly it checks if destination is null. If it is, then move is not valid. Secondly it checks if there is no king on destination. Because we cannot kill King by chess rules Thirdly it checks if destination is occupied in logic board, if destination is not the same color
        Parameters:
        board - logic board where all data about current chess board
        legalMoves - list of legal moves calculated for piece where checkMove method invoked
        destination - destination on chessboard
        Returns:
        true if valid, else black

      • getValidCastlingMove

        public Move getValidCastlingMove​(Board board,
                                 King king,
                                 Rook rook)
        Calculates and returns valid castling move for King.
        Parameters:
        board - logic board where is data about current chessboard
        king - king object for castling move
        rook - rook object for castling move
        Returns:
        Valid move for castling

      • getLegalMoves

        public abstract java.util.List<Move> getLegalMoves​(Board board)
        Returns List which contains all legal moves (Move class) for piece
        Parameters:
        board - - logic board where located all data information about current chessboard
        Returns:
        list of legal moves
